Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SCFC) for mobile applications are developed and investigated at the German Aerospace Center (DLR) in Stuttgart.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: Therefore a light-weight stack design was developed in cooperation with the automotive industry (BMW/Munich, Elring-Klinger/Dettingen, Thyssen Krupp/Essen) and the Research Center Julich (FZJ).This concept is based on the application of stamped metal sheet bipolar plates, into which the SOFC cells are integrated by brazing technology.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: For the development and the investigation of the SCFC cells and short stacks, the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) is an important and useful characterization method.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: The paper concentrates on the investigation and on the electrochemical testing of the SOFC short stacks with sintered anode-supported cells (ASC).
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: The short stacks were electrochemically characterized mainly by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, by current-voltage measurements and by long-term measurements.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: The cells and stacks were operated at different temperatures, varying fuel gas compositions, different fuel gas flow rates and at different electrical current loads.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: The influence of these operating conditions on the electrochemical performance of the short stacks is outlined.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy

Sentencas: The nature of losses, e.g. ohmic and the polarization resistances of the electrodes were examined and determined by fitting of the impedance spectra to an equivalent circuit.
Titulo: Investigation of solid oxide fuel cell short stacks for mobile applications by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy
